title: Biden will give Liz Cheney Presidential Citizens Medal
shortDescription: The 20 awards recipients include Americans who fought for marriage equality, an Army nurse during the Vietnam War, and a war correspondent.

title: How many days until Donald Trump's inauguration? What to know
shortDescription: Inauguration Day is less than three weeks away, here is what you need to know ahead of President-elect Trump's inauguration.

title: Biden: Feds probe possible link between Vegas blast, New Orleans assault
shortDescription: President Joe Biden told the nation that federal authorities are looking into a possible link between deadly incidents in Las Vegas and New Orleans.

title: Donald Trump will attend Jimmy Carter's funeral
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump said at a New Year's event at Mar-a-Lago that he will attend former President Jimmy Carter's funeral.

title: Biden, Trump offer sympathies to New Orleans NYE victims and families
shortDescription: Joe Biden and Donald Trump both addressed the New Orleans NYE attack that the FBI says it's investigating as an act of terrorism.

title: Trump's New Year's Eve party: Who attended the Mar-a-Lago gala?
shortDescription: Donald Trump hosted his annual New Year's Eve party at Mar-a-Lago. Attendees included Elon Musk and JD Vance. Laura Trump got up on stage to sing.

title: At NYE gala, Donald Trump says he'll attend Jimmy Carter funeral in DC
shortDescription: Guests at Trump's New Year's Eve party at Mar-a-Lago included Elon Musk, JD Vance, Ted Cruz, Roger Stone and three of Trump's children.

title: Trump's picks warned on social media posting amid confirmation fights
shortDescription: Susie Wiles, Trump's chief of staff in his next administration, sent a memo to nominees for administration jobs reminding them of social media rules.

title: US imposes sanctions on entities in Iran, Russia over election
shortDescription: The Moscow-based CGE also manipulated a video it used to produce baseless accusations concerning a 2024 vice presidential candidate.

title: Who will attend Trump's New Year's Eve gala at Mar-a-Lago?
shortDescription: Donald Trump's annual New Year's Eve gala at Mar-a-Lago on Tuesday evening will have a very different vibe this year - now that he's president-elect.

shortDescription: House lawmakers on Friday are set to vote on the speakership amid dissatisfaction from key Republicans over Mike Johnson's leadership.
